Where Resort-Style lIVING mEETS A fISHERMAN'S dREAM
55+ RV Park With World-Class Fishing in Central Florida
Affordable Lakeside Haven
Welcome to the Kissimmee River Park and Marina. We are an active adult (55 and up) resort community located on the northern edge of Lake Kissimmee State Park. The Kissimmee River Park and Marina is a fisherman’s dream; we have a 78-slip
marina
accessing five of central Florida’s best fishing lakes.
RV
and
mobile home
residents enjoy the peaceful setting and convenience of our resort-style park and well-appointed
clubhouse
. We have full-time residents as well as snowbirds who visit our beautiful park year after year. Kissimmee River Park and Marina offers resort-style living at affordable prices.
Make a Reservation
Experience an Unforgettable Stay
Immerse yourself in the ultimate lakeside retreat at our RV park, boasting a convenient boat dock and marina, perfect for avid anglers and water enthusiasts. Enjoy a wealth of amenities catering to every need, from recreational activities to the clubhouse, ensuring an unforgettable stay for all.
55+ RV Park
At our age-restricted RV park, lot rent ranges from $530-$700 and includes trash pick-up, water, and sewer.
Learn More
Boat Slips
78 slips provide convenient storage and easy access for enthusiasts eager to explore the lakes.
Learn More
World-Class Fishing
Enjoy access to five of Central Florida's premier fishing lakes, where trophy bass, speckled perch, and bluegill await.
Learn More
Amenities
Experience a range of amenities at our RV park, from clubhouse gatherings to recreation facilities and laundry services.
Learn More
Fabulous Fishing for Big bass, speckled perch, & Bluegill
The Kissimmee River Park and Marina offers excellent fishing opportunities with easy water access to five of Central Florida’s best fishing lakes: Cypress, Hatchineha, Kissimmee, Tiger, and Tohopekaliga. Don’t leave your boat at home; we have 78 slips in our covered marina. Our residents enjoy fishing for trophy bass, speckled perch, and bluegill right from their own backyard. Fuel and ice are also available on site. Come for a month, a season, or just stay forever. The Kissimmee River Park and Marina: It doesn’t get any better than this—visit us today!
Visit Us Today
Boat Docks, Fish stations, and More at the Marina
Whether you are a serious trophy fisherman or simply enjoy the occasional outing on a lake, the Kissimmee River Park and Marina is the place to be. Our 78-slip-covered marina is one of the many things that make Kissimmee River Park so special. Permanent and seasonal residents enjoy quick access to Central Florida’s best fishing lakes. Our well-equipped facility has ice and fuel available; electricity is conveniently located so that batteries can be charged right on the bank. A designated boat trailer storage area gives you peace of mind. After a successful day on the lakes, you won’t be bothered by bugs; we have two screened fish stations for cleaning your catch. We have everything, but you—the Kissimmee River Park and Marina is calling your name!
Get In Touch
Want to Learn More About Our Fishing Camp?
Contact Us Today

Resort-Style RV Park & 55+ Camping
With 132 home sites nestled in our 55+ community, you'll find the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. At Kissimmee River Park & Marina, we take pride in our dedicated water and sewer systems, providing peace of mind for our residents. Choose from a range of lot rent options, starting from $490 to $660 per month, all inclusive of trash pickup, water, and sewer services.
Our community boasts paved streets with average width and off-street parking, ensuring easy navigation and accessibility for all residents. Currently, there are 51 spacious spaces available for RVs. With a climate zone rating of hot-humid, enjoy access to lakes, local recreation, shopping, and entertainment options. Bring along your furry companions, with restrictions including a maximum weight limit of 40 lbs and a limit of 2 pets per household. Experience the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure at Kissimmee River Park & Marina.
Reservations
Amenities for Endless leisure and enjoyment
At Kissimmee River Park & Marina, you'll find an abundance of amenities to enhance your lifestyle, including billiards, recreation facilities, a boat dock, a fully-equipped kitchen, boat storage, and more. Indulge in endless opportunities for leisure and enjoyment right in your backyard.

Frequently Asked Questions
Please don't hesitate to call or contact us with any questions you may have!
FAQ Schema json-ld
End of FAQ Schema json -ld
Why is Kissimmee River Park & Marina so popular?
At Kissimmee River Park & Marina, we pride ourselves on our enduring popularity, which stems from the unparalleled amenities and breathtaking surroundings our
RV park
offers. As an
RV park,
we provide a harmonious blend of comfort and convenience, catering to both short-term visitors and long-term residents. Our strategic location grants easy access to central Florida's best fishing lakes, making us a favorite
RV park
among anglers. Boasting a vibrant community spirit, we foster lasting connections among our guests, who relish in our resort-style
RV park
living at affordable prices. Contact our
RV park
today to reserve your spot!
What types of fish can be found in the lakes accessible from the RV park?
Guests at Kissimmee River Park & Marina can expect to catch a variety of fish, including trophy bass, speckled perch, and bluegill, as these lakes are known for their abundant and diverse fish populations.
Is Kissimmee River Park & Marina pet-friendly?
Yes, Kissimmee River Park & Marina welcomes pets, with certain restrictions such as a maximum weight limit of 40 lbs and a limit of 2 pets per household. We understand the importance of furry companions and strive to accommodate them during your stay.

photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
